group_1.textLeft: I see, so the Neo-Magius have already dissolved.

group_1.textRight: Only 'cause it seems the Neo-Magius princess@was done in quick.
I thought fer sure she'd mix things up some more.@I just don't get it.
I s'pose this news ain't a convenience fer you either@now, is it?

group_1.textLeft: But the rumors you started are spreading,@are they not?
As far as I'm concerned, if that gets Magical Girls@to fight, then it doesn't matter.

group_1.textRight: Well, I s'pose so.

group_1.textLeft: ...That's sure strange.

group_1.textRight: Huh?

group_1.textLeft: I'd heard that the Magical Girls of eastern Kamihama and Promised Blood...
had joined forces.

group_1.textRight: The hell?@Juri the Great has never heard that one before.
The story about the east and west was given to@Shigure, which then spread to the apartment girls,
and after that, the story just kept on growin' wild.@It's really gotten everyone fannin' the flames.

group_1.textLeft: By growing wild,
do you mean the rumor has expanded beyond@your expectations?

group_1.textRight: You could say that.
Ryou from the Union died 'cause the west was@too slow to save 'er,
makin' it seem like they had a secret agreement@to offer up her life from the start.
Mikage told Mitama all about that,
so that's at least been spread over to the east side@of the Union.

group_1.textLeft: The strength of their network will be harmful@to them at a time like this.

group_1.textRight: That boomerang's gonna fly right back and hit ya...
Ya have to be careful 'bout this, otherwise@those girls are gonna be gettin' suspicious of the [textYellow:Kimochi],
and start wonderin' if they even can take@the Automatic Purification System.

group_1.textLeft: I was only referring to the "probabilities",@nothing more.

group_1.textRight: Harsh as ever.

group_1.textLeft: More importantly, Livia,@are you fine with all of this?
Even if you declare neutrality,@one day you may be targeted as well.

group_1.textRight: I can keep my cool a whiles longer.
Just as you are, I'm as complicit as "anyone else"@around here.

group_1.progressNarration: [textBlack:The ][textYellow:Kimochi][textBlack: have chosen the members@who will fight.]
[textBlack:After 12 people in each group were selected,@the first to extinguish@was the Neo-Magius.]
[textBlack:This brought about a sign@that the structure of this conflict@was about to transition.]
[textBlack:With the Kamihama Magia Union@and Tokime clan directing their weapons@towards them,@Promised Blood grew impatient.]
[textBlack:The Union was gaining momentum,@a single breath away from finding@Promised Blood's shortcut.]
[textBlack:However, the thoughts of each individual@were in no way connected@to that momentum...]

[textBlack:Miss Kasane suffers@from having ended another's life.@Miss Shizuka is perplexed after being exposed@to the malice of mankind.@And as Ikumi continues to carry the weight@of Ryou's death,@Felicia remembers a fragment of her wish.]
[textBlack:As the group fights as one for salvation,@everyone's problems have sprouted,@eating away at their minds, as one by one@they were about to sink into darkness.]

[textBlack:Tracing back to the root of all of this suffering,@there are the ][textYellow:Kimochi][textBlack:,@who have held the Magical Girls prisoner,@and Kyubey, who had instigated this war,@both of which faintly shine@with glimmers of salvation.]

[textBlack:The way they harm themselves in pursuit@of salvation, it seems to reflect the history@of Magical Girls. No matter the era,@girls give up their own hope and salvation@for a "greater purpose"...]

group_1.textLeft: Good morning, Felicia.
I made beef bowls for breakfast, so try to cheer up, okay?

group_1.textRight: Sure...

group_1.textLeft: Felicia...@Um, are you doing okay...?

group_1.textRight: Huh?
Yeah, I'm fine, I'm up and at 'em!@Meat in the morning's great!

group_1.textCenter: Why would I kill Mommy and Daddy...

group_1.textLeft: Yes, today is a great day!
Let's cheer ourselves up, Felicia...!

group_1.textRight: Yeah!

group_1.textCenter: (Our battle is one of contradicting policies...)
(Kagome may have said that,@but I think she's right...)
(The more our thoughts clash,@the further from salvation we all stray...)
(And I'm still lost as to where to go...)

group_1.textLeft: Your smile's too stiff, and you're stumbling over@your words.
You might be able to fool the customers one at a@time, but there's no way you can do that on stage.

group_1.textRight: Yes, I think the masters would notice...

group_1.textLeft: I understand, let's give it a few more days.@You're still doing great on the management side.

group_1.textRight: Thank you very much.

group_1.narration: I'm sure the reason why the store feels so vast@is because there's an overwhelming emptiness inside me@that can't be filled.
Ryou...@Just what am I supposed to do...?
